docs.snippet: After three months on the market, production of "Wings" shirts, made by the Piedmont Shirt Company, Greenville, S. C., has been stepped up to 3,000 dozen a week and an expanded advertising campaign in newspapers and magazines will be launched-for the...
docs.lead_paragraph: After three months on the market, production of "Wings" shirts, made by the Piedmont Shirt Company, Greenville, S. C., has been stepped up to 3,000 dozen a week and an expanded advertising campaign in newspapers and magazines will be launched-for the Fall season, according to Samuel Wolf, manager of the New York office.

headline.main: Advertising News and Notes; Personnel Ship Line Ads in Newspapers Notes Texaco Tests Treasure Hunt Morgan and Goodkind Merge Accounts

docs.snippet: Bolivia and Paraguay will exchange ratifications of the Chaco peace treaty here tomorrow at a special plenary session of the Chaco peace conference convened for that purpose. It is expected that immediately after this formality the delegates of the...
docs.lead_paragraph: Bolivia and Paraguay will exchange ratifications of the Chaco peace treaty here tomorrow at a special plenary session of the Chaco peace conference convened for that purpose. It is expected that immediately after this formality the delegates of the six mediating American nations, Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Peru, the United States and Uruguay, will form themselves into a new entity to be known as the Arbitral College of the Chaco.
docs.abstract: treaty to be ratified; neutral mil mission to survey arbitral zone

headline.main: Chaco Peace Treaty to Be Ratified Today; Neutral Group Will Decide on New Border

byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: Representatives of Bolivia and Paraguay today formally exchanged instruments of ratification of the July 21 peace treaty, which ended their century-old dispute over the Chaco.
docs.lead_paragraph: Representatives of Bolivia and Paraguay today formally exchanged instruments of ratification of the July 21 peace treaty, which ended their century-old dispute over the Chaco.
docs.abstract: Arrives, Buenos Aires, for Chaco treaty ratification

headline.main: RATIFY CHACO PEACE PACT; Bolivia and Paraguay Exchange Documents at Buenos Aires
